summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue and Twelfth Avenue South, from East Jefferson Street to Jackson Street, et al. In the City of Seattle, by paving and under Ordinance No. 26598, creating Local Improvement Distinct No. 2463, prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
